name: bookhaven
description: BookHaven is a self-hosted eBook library designed to organize and manage digital books. It offers an intuitive web interface for browsing, filtering, and tracking reading progress and integrates with OPDS readers.
features: eBook Library: Organize and manage your digital book collection. Complete cataloging.
Web Interface: Intuitive browsing and filtering through web UI. Easy navigation.
Reading Progress: Track how far you've read in each book. Never lose your place.
OPDS Support: Compatible with OPDS readers for mobile access. Universal compatibility.
Metadata Management: Automatic book information and cover art. Professional organization.
Search & Filter: Find books quickly with powerful search. Instant discovery.
Self-Hosted: Keep your library private on your own server. Complete ownership.
Multi-Format: Support for various eBook formats. Flexible compatibility.
